Class FastAdaptiveUniformisation

  • java.lang.Object
    • prism.PrismComponent
      • explicit.FastAdaptiveUniformisation

  • public final class FastAdaptiveUniformisation
extends PrismComponent
    Implementation of fast adaptive uniformisation (FAU).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FastAdaptiveUniformisation.AnalysisType
      Enum to store type of analysis to perform.
      private static class  FastAdaptiveUniformisation.StateProp
      Stores properties of states needed for fast adaptive method.

      • getMaxNumStates

        public int getMaxNumStates()
        Returns maximal number of states used during analysis.
        Returns:
        maximal number of states used during analysis

      • getValue

        public double getValue()
        Returns the value of the analysis. For reachability analyses, this is the probability to reach state in the reach set, for instantaneous reward properties this is the instantaneous reward and for cumulative reward analysis it is the cumulative reward. For the computation of transient probabilities without doing model checking, this value is not significant.
        Returns:
        value of the analysis

      • setSink

        public void setSink(Expression sink)
             throws PrismException
        Sets which states shall be treated as sink states. To be used for properties like "a U<=T b" where states "b || !a" have to be made absorbing.
        Parameters:
        sink - expressing stating which states are sink states
        Throws:
        PrismException - thrown if problems in underlying function occurs

      • getNumStates

        public int getNumStates()
        Get the number of states in the current window.

      • doTransient

        public StateValues doTransient(double time)
                        throws PrismException
        Compute transient probability distribution (forwards). Start from initial state (or uniform distribution over multiple initial states).
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • doTransient

        public StateValues doTransient(double t,
                               java.io.File initDistFile,
                               Model model)
                        throws PrismException
        Compute transient probability distribution (forwards). Optionally, use the passed in file initDistFile to give the initial probability distribution (time 0). If null, start from initial state (or uniform distribution over multiple initial states).
        Parameters:
        t - Time point
        initDistFile - File containing initial distribution
        currentModel -
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • countNumStates

        private int countNumStates(java.io.File file)
                    throws PrismException
        Counts number of states in a file. We need this function because the functions to read values into StateValues object expect that these objects have been initialised with the right number of states.
        Parameters:
        file - file to count states of
        Returns:
        number of states in file
        Throws:
        PrismException - thrown in case of I/O errors

      • doTransient

        public StateValues doTransient(double time,
                               StateValues initDist)
                        throws PrismException
        Compute transient probability distribution (forwards). Use the passed in vector initDist as the initial probability distribution (time 0). In case initDist is null starts at the default initial state with prob 1.
        Parameters:
        time - Time point
        initDist - Initial distribution
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeTransientProbsAdaptive

        public void computeTransientProbsAdaptive(double time)
                                   throws PrismException
        Compute transient probabilities using fast adaptive uniformisation Compute the probability of being in each state at time t. If corresponding options are set, also computes cumulative rewards. For space efficiency, the initial distribution vector will be modified and values over-written, so if you wanted it, take a copy.
        Parameters:
        time - time point
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • iterateAdaptiveInterval

        private void iterateAdaptiveInterval(double interval)
                              throws PrismException
        Performs fast adaptive uniformisation for a single time interval.
        Parameters:
        interval - duration of time interval
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • arrayIterate

        private int arrayIterate(int iters)
                  throws PrismException
        Transforms the current submodel to array form. In case there are no further changes in the states discovered, or further states only become relevant after a large number of iterations, this allows the analysis to be performed much faster. After the analysis has finished or after it has to be terminated as formerly irrelevant states become relevant, results are mapped back to the original data structure. The method returns the current iteration. In case border states become relevant, this data structure can
        Parameters:
        iters - current iteration number
        Returns:
        current iteration after termination of this method
        Throws:
        PrismException - thrown if problems in underlying methods occur

      • collectValuePostIter

        private void collectValuePostIter(double prob,
                                  double probSum)
        Update analysis value after iteration. For certain analyses (currently cumulative rewards) we have to modify the analysis value after each iteration.
        Parameters:
        prob -
        probSum -

      • updateStates

        private void updateStates()
                   throws PrismException
        Updates state values once a transient analysis of time interval finished. Deletes states which can be deleted according to their current probability and the threshold. Computes new maximal rate for remaining states. Computes transitions to successors of states which have become alive to to probability threshold only after a transient analysis has finished.
        Throws:
        PrismException - thrown if something goes wrong

      • removeDeletedStates

        private void removeDeletedStates()
        Removes all states subject to removal. This affects states which both have a present-state probability below the given threshold, and do not have incoming transitions from states with a relevant probability mass.

      • prepareInitialDistribution

        private void prepareInitialDistribution()
                                 throws PrismException
        Prepares initial distribution for the case of a single initial state.
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeTotalDiscreteLoss

        Computes total sum of lost probabilities.

        Returns the total probability loss.

      • clearSinkStates

                     throws PrismException

      • addToModel

        private void addToModel(State state)
                 throws PrismException
        Adds @a state to model. Computes reward for this states, creates entry in map of states, and updates number of states
        Parameters:
        state - state to add
        Throws:
        PrismException - thrown if something wrong happens in underlying methods

      • computeStateRatesAndRewards

        private void computeStateRatesAndRewards(State state)
                                  throws PrismException
        Computes successor rates and rewards for a given state. Rewards computed depend on the reward structure set by setRewardStruct.
        Parameters:
        state - state to compute successor rates and rewards for
        Throws:
        PrismException - thrown if something goes wrong

      • mvMult

        private void mvMult(double maxRate)
        Perform a single matrix-vector multiplication.
        Parameters:
        maxRate - maximal total leaving rate sum in living states

      • isRewardAnalysis

        private boolean isRewardAnalysis()
        Checks if rewards are needed for analysis.
        Returns:
        true if and only if rewards are needed

      • computeRewards

        private double computeRewards(State state)
                       throws PrismException
        Computes the reward for a given state. In case a cumulative reward analysis is to be performed, transition rewards are transformed into equivalent state rewards.
        Parameters:
        state - the state to compute the reward of
        Returns:
        the reward for state @a state
        Throws:
        PrismException - thrown if problems occur in PRISM functions called
